1.0.name: wordpress/wp-oscommerce-product-display
1.0.description:
WP OSCommerce Product Display is a WordPress plugin that allows you to show products from your separate OSCommerce store in your WordPress site.

It is based on a tutorial on NetTuts by C. Lupu. However it has been extended and turned into a widget which you can add into your sidebar and change the amount of products you wish to show.
